attributes.action: Make Parliament hold a General Election as Corbyn is too afraid to vote for one.
attributes.background:
The Labour party leader a few days ago, was asking for a general election. When the vote for one took place on September 4th 2019 Jeremy Corbyn and many other MP's voted against one.
We want out of the EU by October 31st. Give us, the people a General Election. Stop Labour from destroying Britain.
